short_summary: Service and Repair Closed Circuit Television (CCTV) Systems
description: To Establish a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for the provision of all supervision, labour, transportation, equipment, tools and materials to inspect, service and repair Closed Circuit Television (CCTV) systems at Garrison Petawawa. The period for making call-ups against the Standing Offer is from 1 January 2023 to 31 December 2025.
full_summary:
**Title:** W6889-230145 Service and Repair Closed Circuit Television (CCTV) Systems

**Reference Number:** WS3765658012-Doc3769866626

**Publication Date:** 2022-11-29

**Tender Closing Date:** 2022-12-15T14:00:00

**Tender Status:** Expired

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking a supplier to establish a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for the provision of closed circuit television (CCTV) system maintenance and repair services at Garrison Petawawa.

The supplier will be responsible for providing all necessary supervision, labour, transportation, equipment, tools, and materials to inspect, service, and repair CCTV systems from January 1, 2023, to December 31, 2025. The contract will be for a period of two years and 11 months, with the possibility of call-ups against the Standing Offer during this timeframe.

**Procurement Method:**

* **Procurement Category:** SRV (Services)
* **Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding

**Selection Criteria:**

* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

**Trade Agreements:**

* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Trade Agreements:** Access to Canadian Free Trade Agreement (Local Preference not applicable)

**Contact Information:**

* **Contact Person:** Wayne Cook
* **Contact Email:** wayne.cook@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Contact Information:** Please see the notice URL at the bottom of this document for further details

**Notice URL:**

* http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14763060?extsite=MTQ3NjMwNjBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

This is a formal project to establish a contract for the maintenance and repair of closed circuit television systems at Garrison Petawawa. Any queries or solicitations should be directed to the above contact person or to the notice URL at the bottom of this document. The deadline for tender submission has expired.  No further submissions will be accepted.
